title: Keeling over
creator_credit: Greg Stitt, Derek Wright and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Auckland’s Hauraki Gulf is one of the finest sailing areas in the world, and Bruce Farr is a New Zealand yacht designer with an international reputation. When two Farr yachts engage in three days racing over a course the scene is set for some spectacular sailing.
creator_credit_for_label: Greg Stitt, Derek Wright and New Zealand National Film Unit
